page.home.head.title: Whats up?
page.home.head.danger.sunday.title: Monday is around the corner
page.home.head.danger.sunday.text: The last thing you really want is to go into the new week with a negative number. It is difficult to get out of it.
page.home.week.title: Your last week
page.home.friends.title: What about your friends ?
modal.addFriend.title: What about the others ?
modal.addFriend.text: Invite your friends and save time instead of asking if u can arrange 'Bro Friday'. Always remember 'Bros before Hoes' Peace.
modal.pointModal.title: This is your score
modal.pointModal.text: Give yourself the point which your other half would gave you for today. Were u home? Did u accomplish your duties? Answer these questions and give yourself the points on scale from -10 to 10.
logic.first: Your luck is going different way
